This file contains candidate models for grade 7 students glmath scores.    
1. Data Preprocessing
2. Modeling
3. AIC, BIC, MSE

# Reproducibility   
```{r}
set.seed(489)
```   

# Load Pacakges and Data    
```{r warning=FALSE}
library(readr)
library(dplyr)
library(lme4)
library(purrr)
data <- read_csv("/home/rstudio/TEA_2019.csv")
```  
```{R}
unique_schools <- unique(data$schoolid_nces_enroll_p0)

schools_sampled <- sample(unique_schools, size = round(0.3 * length(unique_schools)))
```
```{r}
df <- data %>% 
  filter(schoolid_nces_enroll_p0 %in% schools_sampled) %>% 
  # Remove variables with only NA's
  select(where(~ !all(is.na(.)))) %>% 
  # Remove irrelevant readng scores.
  select(-c('readng_ver_p0', 
            'readng_lan_p0', 
            'readng_scr_p0', 
            'readng_alt_scr_m1', 'readng_alt_scr_p0',
            'glmath_alt_scr_m1', 'glmath_alt_scr_p0')) %>% 
  select(-c('replacement_id', 'acadyear')) %>% 
  # Remove those didn't have exam scores
  filter(!is.na(glmath_scr_p0), gradelevel == 7) %>% 
  mutate(age_int = round(age))
```   
```{R}
  
vars <- names(df)[sapply(df, function(x) length(unique(x)) < 10)]
  
get_summary <- function(var){
  df %>% 
    group_by(!!sym(var)) %>% 
    summarize(mean(glmath_scr_p0), 
              median(glmath_scr_p0),
              count = n(),
              proportion = n()/nrow(df))
}
  
summary_list <- map(vars, get_summary)
summary_list
```
_ver_  do not consider for now. 
dropout_inferred_ == persist_inferred_ 
migrant too small


  # Candidate models
```{r}
Models_G7_M <- list() 
```
```{R}
Models_G7_M[["mod0"]] <- lmer(glmath_scr_p0 ~ glmath_scr_m1 + (1 | schoolid_nces_enroll_p0), data = df)

Models_G7_M[["mod1"]] <- lmer(glmath_scr_p0 ~ glmath_scr_m1 +  readng_scr_m1 + (1 | schoolid_nces_enroll_p0), data = df)

Models_G7_M[["mod2"]] <- lmer(glmath_scr_p0 ~ glmath_scr_m1 + gender + raceth + (1 | schoolid_nces_enroll_p0), data = df)

Models_G7_M[["mod3"]] <- lmer(glmath_scr_p0 ~ glmath_scr_m1 + gender + raceth + age_int + (1 | schoolid_nces_enroll_p0), data = df)

Models_G7_M[["mod4"]] <- lmer(glmath_scr_p0 ~ glmath_scr_m1 + gender + raceth + age_int + frl_ever + (1 | schoolid_nces_enroll_p0), data = df)

Models_G7_M[["mod5"]] <- lmer(glmath_scr_p0 ~ glmath_scr_m1 + gender + age_int + frl_ever + (1 | schoolid_nces_enroll_p0), data = df)

Models_G7_M[["mod6"]] <- lmer(glmath_scr_p0 ~ glmath_scr_m1 + gender + age_int + frl_now + (1 | schoolid_nces_enroll_p0), data = df)

Models_G7_M[["mod7"]] <- lmer(glmath_scr_p0 ~ glmath_scr_m1 + gender + age_int + frl_now + lep_now + (1 | schoolid_nces_enroll_p0), data = df)

Models_G7_M[["mod8"]] <- lmer(glmath_scr_p0 ~ glmath_scr_m1 + gender + age_int + frl_now + specialed_now + (1 | schoolid_nces_enroll_p0), data = df)

Models_G7_M[["mod9"]] <- lmer(glmath_scr_p0 ~ glmath_scr_m1 + gender + age_int + frl_now + specialed_now + enrfay_school + (1 | schoolid_nces_enroll_p0), data = df)

Models_G7_M[["mod10"]] <- lmer(glmath_scr_p0 ~ glmath_scr_m1 + gender + age_int + frl_now + specialed_now + enrfay_state + (1 | schoolid_nces_enroll_p0), data = df)

Models_G7_M[["mod11"]] <- lmer(glmath_scr_p0 ~ glmath_scr_m1 + gender + raceth + frl_now + specialed_now + enrfay_school + transferred_out_p0 + (1 | schoolid_nces_enroll_p0), data = df)

Models_G7_M[["mod12"]] <- lmer(glmath_scr_p0 ~ glmath_scr_m1 + gender + raceth + frl_now + specialed_now + enrfay_school + transferred_out_p0 + transferred_out_m1 + (1 | schoolid_nces_enroll_p0), data = df)

Models_G7_M[["mod13"]] <- lmer(glmath_scr_p0 ~ glmath_scr_m1 + gender + raceth + frl_now + specialed_now + enrfay_school + transferred_out_p0 + chronic_absentee_m1 + glmath_lan_p0 + (1 | schoolid_nces_enroll_p0), data = df)

Models_G7_M[["mod14"]] <- lmer(glmath_scr_p0 ~ glmath_scr_m1 + gender + raceth + frl_now + specialed_now + enrfay_school + transferred_out_p0 + chronic_absentee_m1 + glmath_lan_p0 + homeless_now + (1 | schoolid_nces_enroll_p0), data = df)

Models_G7_M[["mod15"]] <- lmer(glmath_scr_p0 ~ glmath_scr_m1 + gender + raceth + frl_now + specialed_now + enrfay_school + transferred_out_p0 + chronic_absentee_m1 + glmath_lan_p0 + homeless_now + migrant_now + (1 | schoolid_nces_enroll_p0), data = df)

Models_G7_M[["mod16"]] <- lmer(glmath_scr_p0 ~ glmath_scr_m1 + gender + raceth + frl_now + specialed_now + enrfay_school + transferred_out_p0 + chronic_absentee_m1 + glmath_lan_p0 + homeless_now + migrant_now + persist_inferred_p0 + (1 | schoolid_nces_enroll_p0), data = df)

Models_G7_M[["mod17"]] <- lmer(glmath_scr_p0 ~ gender + raceth + frl_now + specialed_now + enrfay_school + transferred_out_p0 + transferred_out_m1 + chronic_absentee_p0 + chronic_absentee_m1 + glmath_lan_p0 + glmath_lan_m1 + persist_inferred_p0 + persist_inferred_m1 + (1 | schoolid_nces_enroll_p0), data = df)

Models_G7_M[["mod18"]] <- lmer(glmath_scr_p0 ~ glmath_scr_m1 + gender + raceth + frl_now + specialed_now + enrfay_school + transferred_out_p0 + chronic_absentee_p0 + glmath_lan_p0 +  persist_inferred_p0 + (1 | schoolid_nces_enroll_p0), data = df)
```

```{R}
Models_G7_M_Sum <- list()

for(i in seq_along(Models_G7_M)) {
  Models_G7_M_Sum[[i]] <- list(
    model = Models_G7_M[[i]],
    AIC = AIC(Models_G7_M[[i]]),
    BIC = BIC(Models_G7_M[[i]]),
    MSE = mean(residuals(Models_G7_M[[i]])^2)
  )
}
names(Models_G7_M_Sum) <- names(Models_G7_M)

```
